dict.acceptation: 最后，终于；总算；末后；结果；

sent.orig: Use a finally block to release resources.
Finally, the decade-long dream has finally left eyes, and I hope this is a good start.
sent.trans: 终于，长达十年的梦里的那双眼睛终于离去了，但愿这是个好开始。

sent.orig: Peace was finally restored in the city [The city was finally restored to tranquility].
sent.trans: 这座城市最后恢复平静。

sent.orig: I did not know finally he has used any method, finally vast factory manager has agreed.
sent.trans: 最终我也不知道他用了什么手段，终于汪洋厂长就同意了。

sent.orig: After getting that rise my finances are finally are finally in good shape.
sent.trans: 在提高了工资后，我的经济情况终于使我感到满意。
